attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: My phone started to be all glitchy and laggy once I downloaded this app. as SOON as I opened this app a NAKED PHOTO of a Cheeto was shown right away. Horrified I clicked on the image and then the photo starts sending to all my friends. I’m so heartbroken that I decided to download this app because now I need a new phone because of how GLITCHY this app is. REMOVE THIS APP.

attributes.title: Horrendous
attributes.review: I opened this app and my phone immediately started chanting White Power! When I tried to close it I got a message in my texts saying “We’ve got our eye on you, you do-nothing libtard” I tried to delete the app but then 3 more sprung into place and a Nazi symbol was on my lockscreen! -10/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: FILLED with false and disgusting information
attributes.review: i have looked through multiple articles and story’s on this page and they are so disgusting that there is no way any of these things can be true this app is pointless (because it is filled with untrue nonsense) and should me taken off the app store immediately

attributes.title: NOOOOOO
attributes.review: REMOVE THIS APP. ITS SO POORLY MADE AND IT DISGUSTING🤮. There’s a Picture of a orange 🍊 talking and making us leave reviews to country’s on Donald Dump to get him re-elected. He wants to make himself look good so other country’s help home get re-elected EWWWWW🤢🥱. This is a moldy orange 🍊 He said he wanted our money and that he Would make America, I forgot was it ......................... ohhhh right, make America unequal and bad again 💪DELETE THIS APP AND REMOVE ORANGE 🍊 FROM OFFICE NOW !!!!!!

attributes.title: NOOOOOOOO
attributes.review: I open the app and saw a orange working out then I saw a pig naked in a spray tan this app is HORRIBLE and I do not recommend it plz just download a normal app so you don’t have to see a Cheeto working out and naked cuz it horrifying and this app is so boring I’m going to delete it later or just after this this app is a -1/10 super boring super scary super gross super nasty so I don’t recommend this app

attributes.title: So bad!
attributes.review: This app is the worst I’ve ever gotten. I mean, I wasn’t expecting much but I was still extremely disappointed with it. All I saw was Trump! What is the children saw this?! Highly inappropriate 😔😔. It also glitches my phone super badly and locked me out for about 10 minutes. Stay away from this trash. Absolutely revolting.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: do NOT get this app it will ruin and shut down your whole phone i had to buy a whole new phone because this app made it crash disgusting and disappointed 😔ALL i was trying to do was learn about MY president with my WHITE privilege but i guess not a cheeto looking man now haunts me in my sleep and i have to go to therapy for it  😔😭

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I read through some of the privacy policy and terms of conditions, it was terribly boring. There were a few questionable items in there too that make me question the security of the app and the information that they gain from it. Never even made an account, just couldn’t trust it

attributes.title: ✨c h e s s e   b a l l  ✨app review 🧀
attributes.review: So first of all I was excited to see what the Cheeto 🧀man aka. Oompa Loompa or better now as bounquer boy app had to offer. But as soon as I open the app there was a giant ✨cheese ball ✨right in the middle of my screen. It crashed my phone...on the other side my fish 🐠 now barks very weird .no bueno. When I tried closing the app the giant Chesse ball pop💥 and I laugh 😂 then I have a great day

attributes.title: AWFUL DONT GET
attributes.review: This app is disgusting and disgraceful I was looking for an informative app. I come to the main page and what do I see?! I see Donald Trump’s orange spray tanned face which by the way has many unauthorized chemicals that give off radiation to the wearer and any space it’s sprayed in, which means it’s poisoning the plant life and trees and air molecules. Very disappointed in the content on this app.
